articles.title: Batting collapses 'a bit of a concern' for Sri Lanka - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "We were planning how we can get to 240 or 250 and back our bowling to defend it," says batting coach Naveed Nawaz
articles.content:
News"We were planning how we can get to 240 or 250 and back our bowling to defend it," says batting coach Naveed Nawaz
Andrew Fidel Fernando is ESPNcricinfo's Sri Lanka correspondent. @afidelf

articles.title: “I Miss Him”: Emotional Lando Norris Pours His Heart Out for Daniel Ricciardo While Giving Heartwarming Insights Into Their Bromance - EssentiallySports
articles.description: Commenting on his relationship with his McLaren ex-teammate, Lando Norris says he has nothing but "love" for Daniel Ricciardo.
articles.content: It was big news when Daniel Ricciardo left Renault (now Alpine) to join McLaren in 2021. Looking at their jolly personalities, Ricciardo and his to-be McLaren teammate, Lando Norris, was touted to be… [+3445 chars]

articles.author: Elijah Odetokun
articles.title: Mason Mount's Cute Video Copying CR7's Free Kick Technique as a Child Surfaces Online - Sports Brief
articles.description: Mason Mount is nearing a £60m move to Manchester United. His video imitating Cristiano Ronaldo's freekick had emerged online and Red Devils fans love it.
articles.content:
• Mason Mount is nearing a move to Manchester United after both clubs agreed on a fee
  • Mount rejected contract offers from Chelsea, and the club could not risk losing him for free
